text: @PresidencyZA Ur allowing so many human rights infringements? Discrim, torture, etc etc. All done by your ministers in the name of covid19. I promise to find cigarettes ANY way i can, IF i get sick ill stay home, you wont have to worry bout me. I choose smoke, my right as a human! #Covid19SA
